name: Soccer Football Ball Run - Brazil World Futbol Showdown 2015
name_original: Soccer Football Ball Run - Brazil World Futbol Showdown 2015
description:
Flip Flap Roll Bouncing Champ Soccer Ball!

[How to play]

> Tap above to jump
> Tap below to duck
> Navigate the field maze
> Avoid the holes

[Features]

> Easy to learn
> Highly addictive
> Endless runner style gameplay
